title: Careless People
author: Aldipower
aiHeadline: Careless People: Because nothing says 'I care about privacy' like sharing your data with a tech giant who's already famous for being careless with it.

title: I wrote to the address in the GPLv2 license notice (2022)
author: ekiauhce
aiHeadline: I wrote to the address in the GPLv2 license notice (2022): Because who doesn't want to send a letter to an address that's been obsolete for decades? Now we know what happens when you do.

title: Mark Zuckerberg says social media is over
author: FinnLobsien
aiHeadline: Mark Zuckerberg says social media is over: Because after years of ruining privacy and addicting us all, who better to declare its death than the man who built it?

title: On loyalty to your employer (2018)
author: Peroni
aiHeadline: On loyalty to your employer (2018): Because why bother with loyalty when your employer is probably just waiting for you to make a mistake so they can fire you without a second thought.

title: Manufactured consensus on x.com
author: cogitovirus
aiHeadline: Manufactured consensus on x.com: Because nothing says 'free speech' like a platform that carefully curates opinions to match its founder's views.
